mapper.select: select CUS_NO , CUS_NAME , CUS_TEL , CUS_EMAIL from CUSTOMER where CUS_NO = #{CUS_NO};

select ME.MENU_NO , ME.STORE_NO , ME.MENU_NAME , FORMAT(ME.MENU_PRICE, 0) MENU_PRICE , ME.MENU_HIDE , ME.MENU_INFO , SI.PHOTO_NAME from MENU ME LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO, PHOTO_TYPE, PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE LIKE 'ME%') SI ON (ME.STORE_NO, ME.MENU_NO) = (SI.STORE_NO, SI.PHOTO_TYPE) where ME.STORE_NO = #{store_no};
SELECT STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_TEL , STORE_LOCATION FROM STORE WHERE STORE_NO = #{store_no};

SELECT R.RES_NO , ST.STORE_NAME , SE.SEAT_NAME , str_to_date(R.RES_DATE, '%Y%m%d') RES_DATE , P.PAID_AMOUNT FROM RESERVATION R JOIN PAYMENT P ON R.PAY_NO = P.PAY_NO JOIN STORE ST ON R.STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO JOIN SEAT SE ON (SE.SEAT_NO, SE.STORE_NO) = (R.SEAT_NO, ST.STORE_NO) WHERE R.RES_NO = #{RES_NO};
